import re

def palin_subseq_search(x, y):
    """Check if the second string, or any of its reverse versions, are found as a continuous subset within the first string."""
    x = re.sub('\\W+', '', x).lower()
    y = re.sub('\\W+', '', y).lower()
    return y in x and y[::-1] in x

import re

def palin_subseq_search(x, y):
    """Check if the second string, or any of its reverse versions, are found as a continuous subset within the first string."""
    x = re.sub('\\W+', '', x).lower()
    y = re.sub('\\W+', '', y).lower()

import re

def palin_subseq_search(x, y):
    """Check if the second string, or any of its reverse versions, are found as a continuous subset within the first string."""
    x = re.sub('\\W+', '', x).lower()

def palin_subseq_search(x, y):
    """Check if the second string, or any of its reverse versions, are found as a continuous subset within the first string."""

import re

def palin_subseq_search(x, y):
    """Check if the second string, or any of its reverse versions, are found as a continuous subset within the first string."""
    x = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', x).lower()
    y = re.sub('\\W+', '', y).lower()
    return y in x or y[::-1] in x

import re

def palin_subseq_search(x, y):
    """Check if the second string, or any of its reverse versions, are found as a continuous subset within the first string."""
    x = re.sub('\\W+', '', x).lower()
    y = re.sub('\\W+', '', y).lower()
    return y in x or y[::--1] in x
